titles.title: REAL Space Act
REAL Space Act
Reasserting American Leadership in Space Act
Reasserting American Leadership in Space Act
To direct the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to plan to return to the Moon and develop a sustained human presence on the Moon.
REAL Space Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Space.

bill.summary:
Reasserting American Leadership in Space Act or the REAL Space Act
This bill directs the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) to plan to return to the Moon by 2023 and to develop a sustained human presence there in order to promote exploration, commerce, science, and U.S. preeminence in space as a stepping stone for future exploration of Mars and other destinations.
